entry.title: 3-Class Sentiment Classification Pipeline
entry.content:
An NLP pipeline for sentiment analysis of customer feedback as positive, neutral or negative. Includes database connection, text preprocessing, running the models, evaluation and comparison of models, and visualization of results.

Check out the code on github
entry.summary: An NLP pipeline for sentiment analysis of customer feedback as positive, neutral or negative. Includes database connection, text preprocessing, running the models, evaluation and comparison of models, and visualization of results.

entry.title: C-Tran Breadcrumbs Pipeline
entry.content:
Kafka data pipeline handling realtime C-Tran bus data. For the course: Data Engineering. I won first prizes for best presentation, and for best extended features (I added logging, data backups and multiple modes of ingestion, as well as a guarantee to insert only once to protect from collisions)

Check out my presentation video on YouTube
entry.summary: Kafka data pipeline handling realtime C-Tran bus data. For the course: Data Engineering. I won first prizes for best presentation, and for best extended features (I added logging, data backups and multiple modes of ingestion, as well as a guarantee to insert only once to protect from collisions)

entry.title: Kiwifruit
entry.content:
Kiwifruit (often abbreviated as kiwi), or Chinese gooseberry is the edible berry of several species of woody vines in the genus Actinidia.

The most common cultivar group of kiwifruit is oval, about the size of a large hen’s egg (5–8 cm (2.0–3.1 in) in length and 4.5–5.5 cm (1.8–2.2 in) in diameter).
entry.summary: Kiwifruit (often abbreviated as kiwi), or Chinese gooseberry is the edible berry of several species of woody vines in the genus Actinidia.

entry.title: Apples
entry.content:
An apple is a sweet, edible fruit produced by an apple tree.

Apple trees are cultivated worldwide
entry.summary: An apple is a sweet, edible fruit produced by an apple tree.

entry.title: Bananas
entry.content:
A banana is an edible fruit – botanically a berry – produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.

In some countries, bananas used for cooking may be called “plantains”
entry.summary: A banana is an edible fruit – botanically a berry – produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.
